name: Sly Pigs
description: “Sly Pigs” is a puzzle with arcade elements. Wander through the expanses alone or together with your pig-comrades, solve puzzles, collect acorns and be very careful because there are mines everywhere scattered around.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
